articles.title: Top U.S. military officer expects Ukraine conflict to be "measured in years" - CBS News
articles.description: Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff General Mark Milley told Congress Tuesday that Russia initiated a conflict in Ukraine that will last for quite some time.
articles.content:
The highest ranking military officer in the U.S. said Tuesday that he expects the conflict in Ukraine to last years.

articles.description: In his first public comments since returning to Earth aboard a Russia space craft, astronaut Mark Vande Hei says the war in Ukraine didn't hurt relationships aboard the International Space Station.
